title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4235.3 - Temporary change of colors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4235.3 - Temporary change of colors

State Regulations

Any temporary change from the recorded colors of the
owner must be approved by the judges; posted by the clerk of the scales and
notice given to the public, while or before the horses are parading, over the
public address system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4235.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
